issues.description: Timer/interval created without storing ID for cleanup
issues.suggestion: Store ID and clear in cleanup: const id = setInterval(...); return () => clearInterval(id)

issues.description: State update after async operation without cleanup check
issues.suggestion: Use cleanup flag: let isMounted = true; ... if (isMounted) setState(...)
